comment:
* Class containing the identifiers used to update device management-related system strings
         * in the SystemUi package.
         *
         * @hide

variables.name: QS_WORK_PROFILE_LABEL
variables.comment: * Label in quick settings for toggling work profile on/off.

variables.name: QS_MSG_MANAGEMENT
variables.comment: * Disclosure at the bottom of Quick Settings to indicate device management.

variables.name: QS_MSG_NAMED_MANAGEMENT
variables.comment:
* Similar to {@link #QS_MSG_MANAGEMENT} but accepts the organization name as a
             * param.

variables.name: QS_MSG_MANAGEMENT_MONITORING
variables.comment: * Disclosure at the bottom of Quick Settings to indicate device management monitoring.

variables.name: QS_MSG_NAMED_MANAGEMENT_MONITORING
variables.comment:
* Similar to {@link #QS_MSG_MANAGEMENT_MONITORING} but accepts the
             * organization name as a param.

variables.name: QS_MSG_MANAGEMENT_NAMED_VPN
variables.comment:
* Disclosure at the bottom of Quick Settings to indicate device management and the
             * device is connected to a VPN, accepts VPN name as a param.

variables.name: QS_MSG_NAMED_MANAGEMENT_NAMED_VPN
variables.comment:
* Similar to {@link #QS_MSG_MANAGEMENT_NAMED_VPN} but also accepts the
             * organization name as a param.

variables.name: QS_MSG_MANAGEMENT_MULTIPLE_VPNS
variables.comment:
* Disclosure at the bottom of Quick Settings to indicate device management and the
             * device is connected to multiple VPNs.

variables.name: QS_MSG_NAMED_MANAGEMENT_MULTIPLE_VPNS
variables.comment:
* Similar to {@link #QS_MSG_MANAGEMENT_MULTIPLE_VPNS} but also accepts the
             * organization name as a param.

variables.name: QS_MSG_WORK_PROFILE_MONITORING
variables.comment: * Disclosure at the bottom of Quick Settings to indicate work profile monitoring.

variables.name: QS_MSG_NAMED_WORK_PROFILE_MONITORING
variables.comment:
* Similar to {@link #QS_MSG_WORK_PROFILE_MONITORING} but accepts the
             * organization name as a param.

variables.name: QS_MSG_WORK_PROFILE_NETWORK
variables.comment:
* Disclosure at the bottom of Quick Settings to indicate network activity is visible to
             * admin.

variables.name: QS_MSG_WORK_PROFILE_NAMED_VPN
variables.comment:
* Disclosure at the bottom of Quick Settings to indicate work profile is connected to a
             * VPN, accepts VPN name as a param.

variables.name: QS_MSG_PERSONAL_PROFILE_NAMED_VPN
variables.comment:
* Disclosure at the bottom of Quick Settings to indicate personal profile is connected
             * to a VPN, accepts VPN name as a param.

variables.name: QS_DIALOG_MANAGEMENT_TITLE
variables.comment: * Title for dialog to indicate device management.

variables.name: QS_DIALOG_VIEW_POLICIES
variables.comment:
* Label for button in the device management dialog to open a page with more information
             * on the admin's abilities.

variables.name: QS_DIALOG_MANAGEMENT
variables.comment: * Description for device management dialog to indicate admin abilities.

variables.name: QS_DIALOG_NAMED_MANAGEMENT
variables.comment:
* Similar to {@link #QS_DIALOG_MANAGEMENT} but accepts the organization name as a
             * param.

variables.name: QS_DIALOG_MANAGEMENT_CA_CERT
variables.comment:
* Description for the managed device certificate authorities in the device management
             * dialog.

variables.name: QS_DIALOG_WORK_PROFILE_CA_CERT
variables.comment:
* Description for the work profile certificate authorities in the device management
             * dialog.

variables.name: QS_DIALOG_MANAGEMENT_NETWORK
variables.comment: * Description for the managed device network logging in the device management dialog.

variables.name: QS_DIALOG_WORK_PROFILE_NETWORK
variables.comment: * Description for the work profile network logging in the device management dialog.

variables.name: QS_DIALOG_MANAGEMENT_NAMED_VPN
variables.comment:
* Description for an active VPN in the device management dialog, accepts VPN name as a
             * param.

variables.name: QS_DIALOG_MANAGEMENT_TWO_NAMED_VPN
variables.comment:
* Description for two active VPN in the device management dialog, accepts two VPN names
             * as params.

variables.name: QS_DIALOG_WORK_PROFILE_NAMED_VPN
variables.comment:
* Description for an active work profile VPN in the device management dialog, accepts
             * VPN name as a param.

variables.name: QS_DIALOG_PERSONAL_PROFILE_NAMED_VPN
variables.comment:
* Description for an active personal profile VPN in the device management dialog,
             * accepts VPN name as a param.

variables.name: BIOMETRIC_DIALOG_WORK_PIN_LAST_ATTEMPT
variables.comment:
* Content of a dialog shown when the user only has one attempt left to provide the
             * correct pin before the work profile is removed.

variables.name: BIOMETRIC_DIALOG_WORK_PATTERN_LAST_ATTEMPT
variables.comment:
* Content of a dialog shown when the user only has one attempt left to provide the
             * correct pattern before the work profile is removed.

variables.name: BIOMETRIC_DIALOG_WORK_PASSWORD_LAST_ATTEMPT
variables.comment:
* Content of a dialog shown when the user only has one attempt left to provide the
             * correct password before the work profile is removed.

variables.name: BIOMETRIC_DIALOG_WORK_LOCK_FAILED_ATTEMPTS
variables.comment:
* Content of a dialog shown when the user has failed to provide the work lock too many
             * times and the work profile is removed.

variables.name: STATUS_BAR_WORK_ICON_ACCESSIBILITY
variables.comment: * Accessibility label for managed profile icon in the status bar

variables.name: ONGOING_PRIVACY_DIALOG_WORK
variables.comment:
* Text appended to privacy dialog, indicating that the application is in the work
             * profile.

variables.name: KEYGUARD_MANAGEMENT_DISCLOSURE
variables.comment: * Text on keyguard screen indicating device management.

variables.name: KEYGUARD_NAMED_MANAGEMENT_DISCLOSURE
variables.comment:
* Similar to {@link #KEYGUARD_MANAGEMENT_DISCLOSURE} but also accepts organization name
             * as a param.

variables.name: WORK_LOCK_ACCESSIBILITY
variables.comment: * Content description for the work profile lock screen.

variables.name: SCREENSHOT_BLOCKED_BY_ADMIN
variables.comment: * Notification text displayed when screenshots are blocked by an IT admin.

variables.name: KEYGUARD_DIALOG_FAILED_ATTEMPTS_ALMOST_ERASING_PROFILE
variables.comment:
* Message shown when user is almost at the limit of password attempts where the
             * profile will be removed. Accepts number of failed attempts and remaining failed
             * attempts as params.

variables.name: KEYGUARD_DIALOG_FAILED_ATTEMPTS_ERASING_PROFILE
variables.comment:
* Message shown in dialog when user has exceeded the maximum attempts and the profile
             * will be removed. Accepts number of failed attempts as a param.

variables.name: QS_DIALOG_MONITORING_VPN_SUBTITLE
variables.comment: * Monitoring dialog subtitle for the section describing VPN.

variables.name: QS_DIALOG_MONITORING_NETWORK_SUBTITLE
variables.comment: * Monitoring dialog subtitle for the section describing network logging.

variables.name: QS_DIALOG_MONITORING_CA_CERT_SUBTITLE
variables.comment: * Monitoring dialog subtitle for the section describing certificate authorities.
